root.title: handi harman hnh 4th qtr loss
root.body: shr loss 51 ct vs loss three ct net loss 7,041,000 vs loss 467,000 rev 138.9 mln vs 131.4 mln 12 month shr loss 64 ct vs profit 46 ct net loss 8,843,000 vs profit 6,306,0000 rev 558.9 mln vs 556.7 mln note net loss 4th qtr 1986 includ charg restructur 2.6 mln dlr tax 19 ct share 1986 net loss includ tax special charg 2.7 mln dlr 20 ct share
